```{r blue, include=FALSE}

text <- read_csv("congress_test.csv", col_names = FALSE) %>%
  mutate_if(is.character, replace_na, replace = "") %>%
  mutate(list = paste(X1, X2, X3, X4, X5)) %>%
  select(list)

paste(unlist(text), collapse = "")
```
